content: basic cuff-down socks pattern by beth sketoe materials us 1/2 25mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge approximately 75-80g fingering weight yarn for the largest size scissors tapestry needle stitch markers tape measure/ruler gauge 8 sts per inch and 12 row per inch in stockinette in the round notes pattern sized for 60 64 72 stitch socks pattern is written for cuff down magic loop but can be adapted for dpns or 9 circulars use a stretchy cast on like jeny s stretchy slip-knot cast on abbreviations co cast on st/sts stitch/stitches k knit p purl cc contrast color mc main color pm place marker k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches individually as if to k then k together through the back loops p2tog purl two stitches together s slip_stitch as if to purl if following st is k slip w/ yarn in back if p slip w/ yarn in front rs right side ws wrong side pattern instructions co 60 64 72 sts divide sts evenly across circular needle and join for magic loop knitting in the round cuff k2 p2 around for 20 - 30 rounds choose cuff length based on personal preference if using cc for cuff k 1 round plain before switching to mc for leg leg k all sts for 60 - 80 rounds choose leg length based on personal preference © crazypennygirl designs for personal use only questions email beth at crazypennygirl@hotmail com page 1 heel flap this pattern is written for a heel flap and gusset construction but you can substitute any heel of your choice be sure to adjust the foot length accordingly if using a cc for heel flap change to cc now row 1 rs *s1 k1* repeat between * across 30 32 36 heel sts turn work do not continue to instep sts heel flap is worked flat across heel sts back needle only row 2 ws s1 p to end turn work repeat row 1 and 2 for a total of 30 32 36 row option 1 tip work as many heel flap row as heel sts option 1 if using a cc for heel flap change back to mc now k across 30 32 36 heel sts turn work option 2 heel turn still working back and forth not in the round beginning with a ws row for 60 st sock row 1 ws s1 p16 17 19 p2tog p1 turn row 13 ws s1 p15 p2tog turn row 2 rs s1 k5 ssk k1 turn row 14 rs s1 k14 ssk 16 heel sts remaining row 3 ws s1 p6 p2tog p1 turn begin gusset row 4 rs s1 k7 ssk k1 turn row 5 ws s1 p8 p2tog p1 turn for 64 st sock row 6 rs s1 k9 ssk k1 turn row 13 ws -
